summary: A dentist pretends to be married to avoid commitment, but when he falls for his girlfriend and proposes, he must recruit his lovelorn nurse to pose as his wife.

keywords: dentist|foreign language adaptation|dental assistant|new york city|deception
title: Flor de cactus
